casebody.data:
Susan M. HUNT-KRYGIELL, individually and as Trustee of the Susan M. Hunt-Krygiell Revocable Trust, Appellants,
v.
BALLARD SPAHR LLP, a foreign limited liability partnership; Stanley W. Parry, Esq., individually and in his capacity as Partner, Ballard Spahr LLP; and Michael M. Miles, Esq., Respondents. No. 66767 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MAY 17, 2018

AFFIRMED.
